name: NOMOS Centro Studi Parlamentari
goal: NOMOS is a study center dedicated to the legislative advisory and a partner in public affairs and institutional relations for Italian and foreign companies, associations and organizations.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Internal market and consumer protection; Trade; Food and beverage; Energy; Environment; Competition; Public Health; TLC.
